remoteClasses.name: NuboMouthDetector
remoteClasses.doc: NuboMouthDetector interface. Documentation about the module

methods.name: showMouths
methods.doc: Show or Hide the mouts in the video stream

params.name: viewMouths
params.doc: Determines wheter the detected mouths will be displayed or not

methods.name: detectByEvent
methods.doc: To indicate  the algorithm if process all the images or only when it receives an event

params.name: event
params.doc: 0 (default) => process all the frames without constraints; 1 => process only when we receive a specific event such as face detection

methods.name: sendMetaData
methods.doc: The mouths  detected (x,y,width,height) are sent as metadata

params.name: metaData
params.doc: 0 (default) => metadata are not sent; 1 => metadata are sent

methods.name: multiScaleFactor
methods.doc: Specify how much the image size is reduced at each haar image

methods.name: widthToProcess
methods.doc: this will be the width of the image that the algorithm is going to process to detect mouths
